Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come, <MYNAME> dear. Up and at 'em, it's
morning!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, you look tired!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
So nervous you hardly slept a wink, hmm? Oh,
you poor dear.
<PAGE>
I suppose that explains the bags under your
eyes.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it's times like these that a little breakfast
can go a long way! What do you say we have
some?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you see the heart icons in the upper-left
corner of the screen? Those represent your
stamina.
<PAGE>
When you do work, those will go down. Be
careful, now. If you run out of stamina entirely,
you'll collapse.
<PAGE>
The face icon to the far left represents your
health. If you don't feel well, you'll lose stamina
more quickly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not to fear, though! You can replenish both your
stamina and your health by eating. To a degree,
anyway.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you ever want a refresher on this, check your
bookshelf and read the books on stamina and
health recovery.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, what say we enjoy our breakfast
before it goes cold? This way, dear.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho ho! I blew the dust off an old stew recipe of
mine just for the occasion.
<PAGE>
It's been years since I put this much effort into a
dish. I hope you like it.
<PAGE>
Go on and dig in before it gets cold.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How was it, dear? Did you like it?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good, good! I'm glad you enjoyed it.
<PAGE>
All right. I think it's time we get to the meat of
your training.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, let's go outside. Follow me.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's practice gathering materials and other
things you might find lying on the ground.
<PAGE>
In the mountains, you might find rocks or
sticks, or even nuts and berries just sitting there
on the ground.
<PAGE>
If you find any, feel free to pick them up.
<PAGE>
For practice, why don't you collect some items
lying around on my farm?
<PAGE>
When you spot an item, stand close to it and
<BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to pick it up and put it in
your bag.
<PAGE>
To take it back out, either <BLUE>press the X Button</BLUE> or
touch the bag icon on the touch screen to open
your bag.
<PAGE>
Anyway, get out there and pick up <BLUE>5 pebbles</BLUE>
and <BLUE>5 twigs</BLUE> and bring them back to me.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear, it looks like you haven't found them all
yet. Keep looking!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My my, and where do you think you're off to in
such a hurry? Keep looking for the rest of the
items you need to collect!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done, dear! Here, you've put in a good
effort. Refresh yourself with this drink.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can sell the items you pick up at the Trade
Depot, if you'd like.
<PAGE>
I'll teach you more about that tomorrow.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I think that's enough for today. You must be
all tuckered out from running around the farm.
<PAGE>
Why don't you take the rest of the day off and
explore the town?
<NAME_UNKNOWN><FONT_SIZE_L> Hey Granny! I'm here to help!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Huh? Who's this, Granny?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is <MYNAME>, the new farmer who arrived
yesterday.
<PAGE>
Right now, we're going over some of the finer
points of farm chores.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Issat so?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heya! I'm <BLUE>Fritz</BLUE>, a farmer like yourself. Good to
meet'cha!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, have you got anythin' I can help out
with, Granny?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME> is helping me out, so I think I'm set
for today. But thank you for dropping by.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, gotcha.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, before I forget, I have a favor to ask of both
of you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure! Anything you want, Granny!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wonderful. Since both of you are close in age,
I'd really like to see the two of you become
friends.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh, is that it? No problemo! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Your name's <MYNAME>, right? Well,
<MYNAME>, as of today we're best buds! I know
we'll get along great!
<PAGE>
Oh, hey! Wanna come along to the river with
me?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's getting kinda hot out, so a dip in the river'll
feel great. C'mon! The river's not far from here.
<PAGE>
I'm gonna go on ahead. Don't keep me waiting,
all right?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ho ho ho! Such an energetic scamp, that Fritz.
He's a sweet boy at heart, so I hope you two get
along.
<PAGE>
I can hold down the fort here, so why don't you
go on and play with Fritz for a while?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
But remember, morning's gonna come earlier
than you expect, so don't stay out too late!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Geez, <MYNAME>, what kept you? C'mon, let's
jump in!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Whoa whoa whoa. You've never gone swimming
in a river before?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right then, I'll teach ya how! Do exactly what
I say, got it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When you see a dock like this, you can walk out
onto it and <BLUE>press the B Button</BLUE> to jump in.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you're in the water, you can use the <BLUE>Circle
Pad</BLUE> to swim around.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Press the A Button</BLUE> to dive underwater. If there's
anything down on the riverbed, you'll pick it up.
<PAGE>
When you're done swimming and wanna get
out, just head back to the dock and <BLUE>press the B
Button</BLUE>. Give it a try.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, just a plain 'ol stone? I guess it all comes
down to luck. Sometimes, though, you can
dredge up some really awesome stuff!
<PAGE>
Oh, just to remind you, diving underwater takes
stamina, so be careful not to overdo it.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Welp, that's about all there is to swimming
lessons! Doesn't it feel liberating knowing how
to swim?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you ever want a refresher on how to swim,
here's a book about it for your bookshelf.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay, enough education, it's fun time now! Let's
dive on in!

You and Fritz played together for hours in the
river. The cool water felt great on such a warm
day!
<PAGE>
<RED>REMINDER: Swimming in real rivers can be
dangerous, but the game's rivers are all safe, so
jump in and have fun!</RED>

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, that was fun! One more thing, though...
<RED>Don't ever throw trash in the river. Everyone'll get
mad at you if you do</RED>.
<PAGE>
Anyway, let's do this again sometime!
<PAGE>
How about this? Why don't you stop by my farm
sometime? It's down at the base of the
mountain.
<PAGE>
You can stop by whenever! See ya!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. It looks like you don't have enough
twigs yet. You need to find
<BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> more.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. It looks like you don't have enough
pebbles yet. You need to find
<BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE> more.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. It looks like you don't have enough
twigs or pebbles yet.
<PAGE>
You need <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> more twigs and <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE> more pebbles.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I trust you understand how to pick up items
now? You'll find all kinds of things lying about,
so pick up whatever catches your fancy.
<PAGE>
I'll send you a book that explains it that you can
put on your bookshelf. Give it a read if you'd
ever like to jog your memory.
Today was exhausting. I want to go to sleep...
<BLUE>Picking Up Items</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
<BLUE>Recovering Stamina</BLUE> was added to your shelf.
<BLUE>Using a Bag</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
I got a <BLUE>stone</BLUE>!
<BLUE>Swimming</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
I got some <BLUE>orange juice</BLUE>!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you have fun playing in the river, dear?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's wonderful! You must be all tuckered out.
Why don't you call it a night?
<PAGE>
Now here's today's allowance. And don't forget
to write in your journal before you go to bed.
<PAGE>
Good night, dear.
<BLUE>About Your Health</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
Received 500G.
